page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content:
{MUCH WENLOCK, FARLEY AND HOMER.}
{EMPLOYMENT.}Mainly mixed farming, deciduous woods low land, forestry Wenlock Edge.Industry:- limestone quarries & services to agriculture & tourism. Many work outside survey area. {LANDSCAPE.}The survey area is designated as being of Outstanding Natural Beauty. Much Wenlock, a small market town, is the centre of a farming community. North of the town is the silurian limestone escarpment of Wenlock Edge, divided from the Shropshire plain beyond by the R. Severn. {POPULATION.}North of the town itself population is sparse, scattered between 6 farms, a few cottages, & the settlements of Wigwig, Farley & Homer with some housing for commuters.
